resources.string: Penang Hill was the first colonial hill station developed in Peninsular Malaysia.
Kek Lok Si is the second largest Buddhist temple in Malaysia.
"Brother and Sister on a Swing" is a mural by a young foreigner deaf-mute artist, Louis Gan.
Penang Botanic Gardens was established by Charles Curtis of Britain in 1884.
Penang is known for being the "food paradise" of Malaysia.
Are you sure you want to do this?
